asatruLessonIntro->Hear the words of Odin, All-Father, who whispers from the Well of Urd:
asatruLessonIntro->Lo, the verses of the Völuspá proclaim to all who would listen:
asatruLessonIntro->Take heed of Thor's hammer as it strikes, for it teaches:
asatruLessonIntro->Hark, the ravens Huginn and Muninn circle and cry their truth:
asatruLessonIntro->Under the shade of Yggdrasil, the gods did gather and declare:
asatruLessonIntro->By the light of Baldr's blessing, know this:
asatruLessonIntro->On the fjords of the Nine Worlds, wisdom echoes, saying:
asatruLessonIntro->The runes carved deep into the stones of Midgard teach us thus:
asatruLessonReinforcement->May your deeds echo in the halls of Valhalla.
asatruLessonReinforcement->The Norns weave your destiny with threads of honor.
asatruLessonReinforcement->Stand firm, for the gods reward courage and resolve.
asatruLessonReinforcement->Hail, for your actions shall inspire skalds to song.
asatruLessonReinforcement->The hammer of Thor blesses those who uphold truth and strength.
asatruLessonReinforcement->The All-Father watches those who honor the old ways.
asatruLessonReinforcement->May you find victory in the sacred bonds of kinship.
lessonReinforcement->And so the tale will live on.
